mapper.sql: id, mbr_store_order_id, winery_id, mbr_id, prod_sku_id, prod_sku_cnt, sku_name, sku_market_price, sku_sell_price, sku_mbr_price, is_integral, integral_amt, integral_cnt, sku_weight, sku_capacity, create_date, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_store_order_item (id, mbr_store_order_id, winery_id, mbr_id, prod_sku_id, prod_sku_cnt, sku_name, sku_market_price, sku_sell_price, sku_mbr_price, is_integral, integral_amt, integral_cnt, sku_weight, sku_capacity, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{mbrStoreOrderId}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrId}, #{prodSkuId}, #{prodSkuCnt}, #{skuName}, #{skuMarketPrice}, #{skuSellPrice}, #{skuMbrPrice}, #{isIntegral}, #{integralAmt}, #{integralCnt}, #{skuWeight}, #{skuCapacity}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_store_order_item
mbr_store_order_id = #{mbrStoreOrderId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
prod_sku_id = #{prodSkuId},
prod_sku_cnt = #{prodSkuCnt},
sku_name = #{skuName},
sku_market_price = #{skuMarketPrice},
sku_sell_price = #{skuSellPrice},
sku_mbr_price = #{skuMbrPrice},
is_integral = #{isIntegral},
integral_amt = #{integralAmt},
integral_cnt = #{integralCnt},
sku_weight = #{skuWeight},
sku_capacity = #{skuCapacity},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from m_mbr_store_order_item where mbr_store_order_id = #{mbrStoreOrderId} and order_status = 4
